name: Portfolio
description: A react project to present my experience and work as a portfolio in a clear and nice presentation.

name: pmOne Share
description: pmOne Share is a web app that creates tile-based dashboards, reporting- and corporate portals. pmOne Share makes it possible to build departmental and corporate solutions independently and in a manner appropriate to the needs, thus providing a single point of access - a single point of information - for the presentation of relevant information.
